tag_list: video, filmmaking, videographer, entrepreneur, canada, ihonest
overview:
I’m a Vancouver based independent filmmaker, videographer and entrepreneur. I’ve been shooting video for over 5 years, with experience in short films, music videos, television spots, live in-studio television & news, event and concert videography and documentaries. I shoot independently or with a small team often and have been focusing on event and music videos recently.

I also have experience with motion graphics, post-production and design - basically I can see a video from concept through delivery. I can work with you to craft a story, message or concept and see it all the way through the video production process through till delivery/distribution, especially online video. For examples of my work, please see my website: www.nathanskillen.com

I’m also Co-Founder of iHonest.com - a new startup focused on helping people establish instant trust and credibility. Please visit our website www.ihonest.com for more information!
